00020 /********************************************** Initialisation Code ***************************************/
00021 - (void) initWithParent:(id)parent{
00022         [super init];
00023         owner = parent;
00024         [NSBundle loadNibNamed:@"GUILogin" owner:self];
00025 }
00026 
00027 /********************************************** Button Handler ********************************************/
00028 -(IBAction) logIn:(id)sender {
00029         
00030         /* Check the state of the "Remember Me" button */
00031         bool option;
00032         if([remember state] == NSOnState) option = YES;
00033         else if([remember state] != NSOnState) option = NO; 
00034         
00035         /* Set the variables back at InvisiView */
00036         [owner setPassword: [password stringValue]];
00037         [owner setUsername: [username stringValue]];
00038         [owner setRemember:option];
00039         
00040 }
